string-array.name: tweet_array
string-array.item: I made the best brownie today
What a sad day for us all
This too shall pass my brethren

string-array.name: comments
string-array.item: You just don\'t like your country
Yeah, I too burned my brownies....
Good for you lad! May I have the precipice?
I can\'t believe all you can think of is brownies in such a terrible day!
You just don\'t like your country
